class\u003d\"custom-table-header\"\u003e\r\n        \u003ctable class\u003d\"custom-table\"\u003e\r\n          \u003cthead\u003e\r\n            \u003ctr\u003e\r\n              \u003cth\u003eField \u003c/div\u003e\r\n\r\n      \u003cdiv class\u003d\"custom-table-body\"\u003e\r\n        \u003ctable class\u003d\"custom-table\"\u003e\r\n          \u003ctbody\u003e\r\n            \u003ctr\u003e\r\n              \u003ctd\u003eYear_Week\u003c/td\u003e\r\n              \u003ctd\u003e52 Weeks Year Starting From Monday, Grouped at SKU\u003c/td\u003e\r\n            \u003c/tr\u003e\r\n            \u003ctr\u003e\r\n              \u003ctd\u003eSALES_VOLUME\u003c/td\u003e\r\n              \u003ctd\u003eMEAN aggregated based on SKU-WW\u003c/td\u003e\r\n            \u003c/tr\u003e\r\n            \u003ctr\u003e\r\n              \u003ctd\u003ePACK_PRICE_PRD\u003c/td\u003e\r\n              \u003ctd\u003eMEAN aggregated based on SKU-WW\u003c/td\u003e\r\n            \u003c/tr\u003e\r\n            \u003ctr\u003e\r\n              \u003ctd\u003ePACK_PRICE_COMPETITOR1\u003c/td\u003e\r\n              \u003ctd\u003eMEAN aggregated based on SKU-WW\u003c/td\u003e\r\n            \u003c/tr\u003e\r\n            \u003ctr\u003e\r\n              \u003ctd\u003ePACK_PRICE_COMPETITOR2\u003c/td\u003e\r\n              \u003ctd\u003eMEAN aggregated based on SKU-WW\u003c/td\u003e\r\n            \u003c/tr\u003e\r\n            \u003ctr\u003e\r\n              \u003ctd\u003ePACK_PRICE_COMPETITOR3\u003c/td\u003e\r\n              \u003ctd\u003eMEAN aggregated based on SKU-WW\u003c/td\u003e\r\n            \u003c/tr\u003e\r\n            \u003ctr\u003e\r\n              \u003ctd\u003ePACK_PRICE_COMPETITOR4\u003c/td\u003e\r\n              \u003ctd\u003eMEAN aggregated based on SKU-WW\u003c/td\u003e\r\n            \u003c/tr\u003e\r\n            \u003ctr\u003e\r\n              \u003ctd\u003ePACK_PRICE_COMPETITOR5\u003c/td\u003e\r\n              \u003ctd\u003eMEAN aggregated based on SKU-WW\u003c/td\u003e\r\n            \u003c/tr\u003e\r\n            \u003ctr\u003e\r\n              \u003ctd\u003eADV_SPEND\u003c/td\u003e\r\n              \u003ctd\u003eSUM aggregated based on SKU-WW\u003c/td\u003e\r\n            \u003c/tr\u003e\r\n            \u003ctr\u003e\r\n              \u003ctd\u003eBAU\u003c/td\u003e\r\n              \u003ctd\u003eSUM aggregated based on
